main event: A round object, size of a pen, pale reddish yellow in color, appeared at a very high altitude and suddenly rose very fast, passing out of sight with no sound.
interesting points: The object appeared first as a 'tailing star' and then suddenly rose very fast.
There were reports of 100 series aircraft in the area with afterburners on, and the object could have been a reflection or refraction of the yellow/orange exhaust trails.
The witness described the object as appearing very close and very bright.
The object faded out into the sky and disappeared from view.
The witness could not provide an estimate of the size or distance of the object.
result: Possibly a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon
sighted object: Round object, size of a pen, pale reddish yellow in color
